thread.title: Heir to Hamilton's Throne - Why Kimi Antonelli?
thread.title_full: Heir to Hamilton's Throne - Why Kimi Antonelli?

title: Heir to Hamilton's Throne - Why Kimi Antonelli?
text:
After a short but sweet debut at the Italian GP, Kimi Antonelli was announced as the driver taking over Lewis Hamilton's seat at Mercedes F1 in 2025, as the 7-time world champion moves on to Scuderia Ferrari.
Who is this 18-year-old Italian driver and is he really the right choice for a Mercedes hoping to regain their dominance in F1? Bryn Lucas is joined by Jake Boxall-Legge and Filip Cleeren to discuss.
0:00 Antonelli's debut at Monza
4:02 Does he deserve more scrutiny?
7:02 Was it wise to debut him at Monza?
9:02 Does he need more experience first?
11:56 Mercedes' performance at the Italian GP
